new.title: Tell your doctor
new.content: Ask your doctor to send e-script for fax to MedX Pharmacy

new.title: We will contact you
new.content: We will contact you to set up delivery or pick up for your medicine

refill.title: fill out the form
refill.content: complete the form with the needed information

refill.title: We will contact you
refill.content: We will contact you to set up delivery or pick up for your medicine

refill.title: You will receive your medication
refill.content: your orders will be confirmed and be delivered to your doorstep or ready for pickup

transfer.title: fill out the form
transfer.content: complete the form with the needed information

transfer.title: we will contact you
transfer.content: We will call your pharmacy to complete the transfer and then contact you to set up delivery or pick up for your medicine

transfer.title: You will receive your medication
transfer.content: your orders will be confirmed and be delivered to your doorstep or ready for pickup

whymedx.title: we are affordable
whymedx.content: We’re not just more affordable compared to other pharmacies—we’re truly dedicated to giving you exactly what you need at a price that won’t hurt your pocket.

whymedx.title: Same-Day Delivery
whymedx.content: On the same day you order your medication, we’ll be able to deliver it directly to your doorstep.

whymedx.title: Patient Consultations
whymedx.content: If you have any concerns regarding your medication, then you can meet with one of our pharmacists for a free consultation.

whymedx.title: $3 Prescriptions
whymedx.content: With our 3-dollar prescriptions, you do not have to worry about not having insurance. You can get the medication you need at a good price.

whymedx.title: Education Program
whymedx.content: We will organize educational seminars to help improve your knowledge about your medications

whymedx.title: Personalized Compounding
whymedx.content: Our pharmacists are trained in creating formulations that fit your exact needs and preferences.

service.title: free delivery
service.content: We pride ourselves in delivering premium services. That service extends to your door. If you can’t come to us, we’ll see that the products you need are delivered right to your home.

service.title: personal injury
service.content: If you were injured in a serious car accident, please call 713-526-1212 or visit 3033 Fannin St, Houston, TX 77004. Our personal injury partner Houston Medical Group will take care of you

service.title: compounding
service.content: compounding is delivery personal care that is suited to your needs

service.title: discount program
service.content:
- $3 generics, check HERE for a list 
- special discounts for members 
- be the first to know special offers and events

service.title: Hospice & senior care
service.content: Our hospice team focuses on providing physical support such as pain management, as well as emotional, social, and spiritual support

service.title: CBD
service.content: CBD, or cannobidiol, offers many health benefit

review.name: Trung Nguyen
review.content: Thank You for saving our baby's life with your promptness and diligence. We are eternally grateful.

review.name: Arthur Huckaby
review.content: They were very helpful with locating a wheelchair for my Mother and worked with us to get the best deal with the insurance company. Even though we do not live near them any longer, we still drive across town because of the service we received. Much better than the other location that we had used for a long time.

review.name: Bonnie Kass
review.content: Excellent customer service and follow up. The staff is very professional and courteous. It was a pleasure working with them.
